meta.title: Mosaic-Integration
document.settings.title: Einstellungen f체r die Mosaic-Integration
sections.configuration-options.descripti: You are able to choose the default order template that is applied when Mosaic creates an order in FOLIO. If a template is chosen while ordering in Mosaic that will override this selection, if no template is chosen this one will be applied. You can edit the default template in order settings under "Order templates".
sections.configuration-options.submit.su: Die Einstellungen f체r die Mosaic-Integration wurden erfolgreich aktualisiert.
sections.configuration-options.submit.er: Die Einstellungen f체r die Mosaic-Integrations wurden nicht aktualisiert.
